description:
Mr. and Mrs. Chandler Bing Forever! After Courteney Cox made a guest appearance on Friends costar Matthew Perry's now-canceled NBC comedy Go On, he's returning the favor by making an appearance on her TBS comedy Cougar Town. 钱德勒·宾夫妇万岁！在柯特妮·考克斯友情客串马修·派瑞主演的NBC喜剧《生活向前冲》（第二季被砍）后，礼尚往来，他也将客串柯特妮主演的喜剧《熟女镇》。
This certainly isn't the first on-screen Friends reunion. Perry and Lisa Kudrow appeared on an episode of Jane Lynch's summer comedy game show, Celebrity Game Night, and Jennifer Aniston and Kurdrow also guest starred on Cougar Town in 2010. 这也不是《老友记》的合作演员们第一次在荧幕重聚了，派瑞和莉莎·库卓在简·里奇的夏日喜剧游戏秀《名人游戏之夜》中重聚。詹妮弗·安妮斯顿和库卓2010年在《熟女镇》也有客串。

Cox, 49, and Perry, 44, played on-screen spouses Monica Gellar and Chandler Bing on the 10-season hit sitcom. No details have been released about Perry's character or when his episode will air, but the show's fifth season premieres on Tuesday, Jan. 7 at 10 p.m. 49岁的考克斯和44岁的派瑞在长达十季的情景喜剧《老友记》中扮演荧幕夫妻——莫妮卡·盖勒和钱德勒·宾。目前没有确切的消息透露派瑞将饰演什么角色以及他所在那集会在何时播出，本剧第五季将在1月7日10点播出第一集。

title: 老友记钱德勒夫妇重聚《熟女镇》
